iisValidators.h

00001 #ifndef iisValidators_H
00002 #define iisValidators_H
00003 
00004 #include <math.h>
00005 #include <QtCore>
00006 
00007 /****************************************************************************
00008 **
00009 ** TValueValidator class
00010 **
00011 ** Class is used as the base for all value validators.
00012 **
00013 *****************************************************************************/
00014 
00030 class TValueValidator : public QObject
00031 {
00032 public:
00033     enum EValidateResult { 
00034         VR_BAD,     
00035         VR_OK,      
00036         VR_FIXED    
00037     };
00038 
00039     // Constructor.
00040     TValueValidator(QObject *parent = 0) : QObject(parent) {};
00041     // Destructor.
00042     virtual ~TValueValidator() {};
00043 
00051     virtual EValidateResult checkValue(QVariant& value) = 0;
00052 };
00053 
00054 /****************************************************************************
00055 **
00056 ** TIntValidator class
00057 **
00058 ** A Validator for Integer values.
00059 **
00060 *****************************************************************************/
00061 
00069 class TIntValidator : public TValueValidator
00070 {
00071 public:
00075     TIntValidator(int minimum = INT_MIN, int maximum = INT_MAX, QObject *parent = 0);
00076     virtual ~TIntValidator() {};
00077 
00083     virtual EValidateResult checkValue(QVariant& value);
00084     
00085 
00089     int minimum() const { return m_minimum; }
00090 
00095     void setMinimum(int min);
00096 
00100     int maximum() const { return m_maximum; }
00101 
00106     void setMaximum(int max);
00107 
00112     void setRange(int min, int max);
00113 
00114 
00115 
00119     static TIntValidator    *s_ByteValidator;
00120 
00124     static TIntValidator    *s_WordValidator;
00125 
00129     static TIntValidator    *s_PositiveValidator;
00130 
00134     static TIntValidator    *s_ZeroPositiveValidator;
00135 
00139     static TIntValidator    *s_IntValidator;
00140 
00141 protected:
00142     int m_minimum, m_maximum;
00143 };
00144 
00145 /****************************************************************************
00146 **
00147 ** TDoubleValidator class
00148 **
00149 ** A Validator for Double values.
00150 **
00151 *****************************************************************************/
00152 
00160 class TDoubleValidator : public TValueValidator
00161 {
00162 public:
00167     TDoubleValidator(double minimum = -HUGE_VAL, double maximum = HUGE_VAL, int decimals = 5, QObject *parent = 0);
00168     virtual ~TDoubleValidator() {};
00169 
00175     virtual EValidateResult checkValue(QVariant& value);
00176 
00180     double minimum() const  { return m_minimum; }
00181 
00186     void setMinimum(double min);
00187 
00191     double maximum() const  { return m_maximum; }
00192 
00197     void setMaximum(double max);
00198 
00203     void setRange(double min, double max);
00204 
00205 
00206 
00210     static TDoubleValidator *s_DoubleValidator;
00211 
00212 protected:
00213     double  m_minimum, m_maximum;
00214     int     m_decimals;
00215 };
00216 
00217 /****************************************************************************
00218 **
00219 ** TRegExpValidator class
00220 **
00221 ** A Validator for values matching given regular expression.
00222 **
00223 *****************************************************************************/
00224 
00232 class TRegExpValidator : public TValueValidator
00233 {
00234 public:
00237     TRegExpValidator(QRegExp &regexp, QObject *parent = 0);
00238     virtual ~TRegExpValidator() {};
00239 
00244     virtual EValidateResult checkValue(QVariant& value);
00245 
00248     const QRegExp& regexp() const   { return m_regexp; }
00249 
00252     void setRegExp(QRegExp &regexp);
00253 
00254 protected:
00255     QRegExp     m_regexp;
00256 };
